des: "Very chocolaty, colorful, tasty, melt in your mouth (and in your hand) treat that anyone can make.  A glass pan is preferred so you can see the pretty colors."
ins: Melt chips on low heat.  Stir in peanut butter and walnuts.  Take pan off heat, and quickly add the mini marshmallows.  Stir until marshmallows are completely covered.  Pour into a 9x13 inch greased pan. Refrigerate.
